sourcesContent:
import React, { useReducer } from 'react'
import { Box, Button, Grid, List, ListItem, Typography } from '@mui/material'
import Board from './Board'

export default function Game() {

    const [state, dispatch] = useReducer

    const status = <Typography>Next Player is X</Typography>
    const moves = (<ListItem><Button>Start the Game</Button></ListItem>);
    const squares = Array(9).fill("");


 return (
    <Grid // center the content
        container
        spacing={0}
        direction="column"
        alignItems="center"
        justifyContent="center"
    >
        <Typography variant='h2'>Tick Tack Toe</Typography>
        <Box className='game-board'>
            <Board squares={ squares }/>
        </Box>
        <Box className='game-info'>
            <Box>{ status }</Box>
            <List>{ moves }</List>   
        </Box>
    </Grid>
  )
}
